fieldValidationRules.name: PHONE_NUMBER_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: PHONE_NUMBER_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validates given field is a valid us phone number or not. Valid examples: +1-898 883 8383

fieldValidationRules.name: DATE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: DATE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if the given date is in proper required format. Example mm/dd/yyyy

fieldValidationRules.name: EMAIL_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: EMAIL_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if the given email address is in proper required format. Example abc@gmail.com

fieldValidationRules.name: PERCENTAGE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: PERCENTAGE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if the given percentage value is in proper required format. Example 90%

fieldValidationRules.name: BOOLEAN_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: BOOLEAN_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if the given input is a boolean or not. Ex: True/False

fieldValidationRules.name: TEXT_NON_EMPTY_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: TEXT_NON_EMPTY_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if the given input is a valid text. Ex: qwerty

fieldValidationRules.name: ZIPCODE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: ZIPCODE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if the given input is a valid zipcode. Ex: 56789

fieldValidationRules.name: BUSINESS_ORG_CHECK
fieldValidationRules.label: Business Organization Validation
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate if only one Business Organization option is selected

fieldValidationRules.name: EIN_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: EIN Validation
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate EIN with external look-up data

fieldValidationRules.name: EMPLOYER_NAME_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: Employer NameValidation
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate Employer Name with DSA Client Name

fieldValidationRules.name: LIMITED_TRUSTEE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: Limited Trustee Validation
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate Limited Trustee Info provided when Trustee and Limited Trustee are different

fieldValidationRules.name: PLAN_EFFECTIVE_DATE_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: Plan Effective Date Validation
fieldValidationRules.description: Validate Different Plan Effective dates based on Plan Type Selection

fieldValidationRules.name: PLAN_NAME_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: Plan Name Validation
fieldValidationRules.description: Compare Plan Name between DSA and PDQ

fieldValidationRules.name: TRUSTEE_EMAIL_VALIDATION
fieldValidationRules.label: Trustee Email Validation
fieldValidationRules.description: Trustee Email will become Mandatory if Primary Signer Name and Trustee Name are different
